item.title: How to make a boss ( multi so everybody can attack it )
item.dc:creator: @cedrick cedrick
item.description:
@cedrick wrote:

im just dont from adding the real nomad to my pi 317 , im not bad , its just im a beginner and im trying to do thing thats its really for a beginner, im starting in rude code, so plz have little bit compation for me. :S

its taked me 4 hours to fix nomad ( i got no any idea on java bracets. i learned by my self , when i was compiling it was saying bracets error so i tryed every thing to make it work and after 4 hours of hard working , i correctly added it. im very happy now,

can u just explain me more easily what u wanna mean by adding some cords^ do i need to make a big scaque of cords then add it to inmulti() ? is that u wanna mean^ i make a big scaque of ( multi ) then everybody who is in this scaque of multi cords , can attack the nomad ? sorry for bad english im french o.O

item.title: How to make a boss ( multi so everybody can attack it )
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

You have to get the coords of the area where you want it to be multi. For the coords of the square area, go to the north-west corner then the south-east corner. To actually make it multi, look for “inMulti()” in Player.java for it to be multi for players and go into NPC.java and search for the same thing for it to be multi for npc’s. Just add the coords in.

Read full topic
